$interpreted: Sophie: Hi! Elio, there you are!
Sophie: (No, no, no, smile's too unnatural...maybe I should just tell him directly that everything I said before was just a joke...)
Sophie: Ru-yi? Hutchinson? Even Hanbei...Why aren't you all at the circus?
Hutchinson: Sophie,  Great, we haven't had time to go see you...
Ru-yi: Sophie, we've got a problem!
Sophie: What happened?
Hanbei: In the morning, Ru-yi hired a cheap mover to help move the tent and now we can't find any of our valuable props. None!
Ru-yi: *sob* *sob* ~~What are we gonna do? ~~ It's all my fault~~
Hutchinson: Ru-yi, don't cry. It's not your fault. We'll go find those Lizards and ask them what happened.
Sophie: Hutchinson's right. Your Ringmaster's still here!
Sophie: Don't worry, let's go!
Baggage Guy: I don't know what the hell you're talking about!
Baggage Guy: That's right! Baseless accusations! What proof do you have that we took your money?
Law: The pound and penny that lie within that luggage is everything I've brought for my travels.
Law: A heavenly blow, this is. If only thee could assist me, your humble servant would be ever so grateful.
Ru-yi: It's them! I recognize that face~ !
Sophie: I'm the Ringmaster of Morgan's Marvelous Circus, and it looks like you're criminals. Now give me back the valuable props we've got in our tent!
Baggage Guy: We...we ain't never been to no circus!
Law: Excuse me, um...I believe I was here first.
Baggage Guy: We'll get to that later. What could a petty circus have that's worth stealing?
Law: I'm not sure whether or not it's possible to fix my problem first?
Hutchinson: I rarely am this upset, but to make this wise and virtuous lady cry is really low! Apologize to Ru-yi!
Ru-yi: *sob* *sob* *sob*...
Sophie: Yeah, go ahead and say you're sorry!
Baggage Guy: I said I didn't steal anything! You think I'm scared just 'cuz you've got more people than us!?
Hanbei: Hey! Don't you think fighting is a little crude!?
Law: One...
Baggage Guy: We'll push you! What are you gonna do about it?
Law: Two...
Baggage Guy: Ouch! What are you doing standing there like a blockhead!?
Law: Three!
Law: Wonderful. I've counted down from three, and now it's time to teach you knuckleheads a lesson!
Baggage Guy: Okay, take it back! Please, valiant knight, let us go and we won't dare do it again!
Law: If thou had known beforehand, there would've been no need...
Law: If I see your faces once more, I'll skin thee alive! Now get going!
Law: Pardon my manners. The name's Law. I hither from the East Alliance.
Ru-yi: ...So polite. It's like two different people...
Hanbei: Oh! I'll teach you. You want to stay safe? When you run into a crazy person, the last thing you want to do is call them crazy!
Sophie: ...Hello, I'm Sophie. This is my circus troupe.
Law: Having just arrived in the Desert Kingdom. I'm not really familiar with this place. I'd like to express my gratitude for thy courageous acts.
Sophie: It's nothing. Victims ought to help each other out.
Sophie: They took this much stuff! That's a little much, don't you think!?
Law: ...*sigh*...had the world not lost its moral compass, they need not do such things. Twisting virtue simply to survive...it tears one's heart to see.
Law: Young Lady, we must not focus on these matters too much. Everyone is fighting an uphill battle.
Ru-yi: ...Didn't he just say he was going to skin those workers alive...?
Hanbei: Shhhh! It's important not to say what you're thinking.  Didn't I tell you? When you meet a crazy person, you must not tell them they're crazy...
Dock Worker: Come out!! You come out now, you hear!!!
Dock Worker: Pay us back! Give us our salary! It's been 3 months and we haven't gotten our salary. Are you trying to starve our families?
Boat Merchant: This ain't my problem! I'm just doing business. If the ships don't go out, then I don't have enough cash!
Boat Merchant: Get out of the way, don't block my path! Guard, get them out of here, right now!
Ru-yi: Scary dude. Looks like he can fight.
Law: Maybe. Maybe not. If only both sides can sit down and talk it over...
Dock Worker: Don't let him get away!
Dock Worker: Burn in a fire, you dirty scumbag!
Bodyguard: Thug! Killer! Where are the soldiers?
Dock Manager: Boys, CHARGE!!!! Let's take our money back!!!
Law: Oh, Lord...

Model.Text: Hi! Elio, there you are!
(No, no, no, smile's too unnatural...maybe I should just tell him directly that everything I said before was just a joke...)

Burn in a fire, you dirty scumbag!
Thug! Killer! Where are the soldiers?
Boys, CHARGE!!!! Let's take our money back!!!
Oh, Lord...
